body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Gregory Rodriguez and the customer's name is Carol Lee.  The conversation is about a random business (a Accounting Firm ) and is a conversation about billing.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Gregory Rodriguez. I am with Bright Accounting Solutions. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Gregory, my name is Carol Lee. I'm feeling a bit confused about my recent billing statement.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Carol. I'm here to help you sort that out. Can you please provide me with your account number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my account number is one two three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information! And could you also confirm your date of birth for me?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course. My date of birth is March seventh, nineteen eighty-five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Carol. Let me take a moment to review your billing statement.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Okay, that would be great. I was charged for services I didn't receive.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand how concerning that can be. I will check into this right away and ensure we correct any errors.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Gregory. I appreciate your help with this.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome, Carol. Thank you for your time today. If you have any further questions, feel free to reach out.
